Home.title: Hi my name is Rasmus
Home.short: I'm a frontend developer focused on React and Typescript

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.short: Feel free to reach out through email och social media!

About.title: About me
About.description: I am a passionate frontend developer with experience in modern web development technologies. Here you can read more about my background, my experiences and what drives me as a developer.
About.background: I have a degree in web development from the Medieinstitutet and have recently completed an intensive frontend-development course with Lexicon. My passion for technology started early, and I love creating solutions that make a difference for users.

experience.2: Web development education from Medieinstitutet (2 years)
experience.4: Experience with different CMS-platforms such as Storybloks, Shopware and Magento 2

About.goals: I aspire to become an expert in React and TypeScript and look forward to building scalable and user-friendly solutions. I also want to continue developing in Node.js and modern frontend frameworks.

Projects.title: My projects
Projects.short: Here are some of the projects I've worked on. Click on a project to read more or to visit it live.
